title: 20 Acre tea estate in Thawalama, Galle
details:
Ridihena Tea Estate: 20 Acres

This land has a Transferable Deeds. (මෙය පුද්ගලික අයිතියක් ඇති සින්නක්කර ඔප්පු සහිත වත්තක්)

On the Deed it shows clear 17 Acres but in the real land there are 20 acres.

This land is directly border the Singharaja rain forest and this land has its own rain forest with no human intervention.
It also has its own tared road, all the way to the Dalu Maduwa (දඵ මඩුව​).
Fully furnished, newly build house with 1000 sqft with foundation for another room. Completed mahogany door frames also available.
Natural spring water starts from this land, therefore it is also possible to start natural spring water business.
This land also has 2 telecom towers from Suntel and hutch that gets 30,000/- rent each month.

Tea : 10 Acres
Cinnamon : 3 Acres
Forest : 7 Acres
Mahogany : 1500 (12 years)
Labor Accommodation : 7-8 families

At the moment, we get about 4000-6000Kg of tea each month.
